page.title: 17NEWTONMORE, THE VILLAGE 3
page.content: This has had a serious effect on business prosperity with the loss of passing trade. Local enterprise, allied to aid from the Highlands and Islands Development Board and other national and Regional bodies has been engaged over the last four years in a special project: "The Newtonmore/Dalwhinnie/Laggan Project" which has attempted to promote a special effort towards recovery. The communities look forward to a ski development taking place between Dalwhinnie and Newtonmore, hopefully in the near future. Features of interest developed over the last few years are the "Clan MacPherson Museum" in Newtonmore and the tourist reception area at Ralia, "the Gateway to the Highlands". Newtonmore awaits the major development of a Highland Folklife Museum/Park very nearby.
